resources.string:
Welcome to Padawan!

This application is a place for you to learn how to use the common features of typical mobile bitcoin wallets, and practice in a safe environment.

It uses bitcoin's testnet only, an alternative bitcoin network used globally and built exlusively for testing. The coins on this network do not hae any value, but the otherwise look and behave just like cormal bitcoins!

You should feel free to experiment, and not worry too much about making mistakes.
